modules.name: packettracer
build-commands: install -Dm644 opt/pt/art/app.png /app/share/icons/hicolor/128x128/apps/com.cisco.PacketTracer.png 2>/dev/null || install -Dm644 opt/pt/art/icon.png /app/share/icons/hicolor/128x128/apps/com.cisco.PacketTracer.png 2>/dev/null || echo 'Icon not found, using fallback'

cat > /app/share/applications/com.cisco.PacketTracer.desktop << 'EOF'
[Desktop Entry]
Type=Application
Version=1.0
Name=Cisco Packet Tracer
GenericName=Network Simulator
Comment=Network simulation and visualization tool
Icon=com.cisco.PacketTracer
Exec=packettracer-wrapper %F
Terminal=false
Categories=Education;Network;Science;
Keywords=cisco;network;simulator;
MimeType=application/x-pkt;application/x-pka;application/x-pkz;
StartupNotify=true
EOF

cat > /app/share/metainfo/com.cisco.PacketTracer.metainfo.xml << 'EOF' com.cisco.PacketTracer CC0-1.0 LicenseRef-proprietary Cisco Packet Tracer Network simulation tool

Network simulation and visualization tool for learning networking concepts.

 com.cisco.PacketTracer.desktop Education EOF
